Package com.company.rest.products.model

Class BackendService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.rest.products.model.BackendService
  • @Component
public class BackendService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class for ProductController. Manages queries to our LiteProductRepository database as well as communication with both ProductController and SquareService.
    See Also:
    ProductController, LiteProduct, LiteProductRepository, SquareService, BackendServiceResponseBody, BackendServiceException

    • Constructor Summary

      Standard full-arg constructor.

      • BackendService

        @Autowired
public BackendService​(LiteProductRepository localRepo,
                      SquareService squareService)
        Standard full-arg constructor.
        Parameters:
        localRepo - A reference to our local DB. Usually @Autowired.
        squareService - A reference to our SquareService instance. Usually @Autowired.

    • Method Detail

      • postProduct

        public BackendServiceResponseBody postProduct​(ProductUpsertRequestBody postRequest)
                                       throws BackendServiceException,
                                              ResourceAlreadyCreatedException
        Handles a POST request to Square's API. After the call to the API is made, ensures that a cached version of the product is maintained in our local DB before returning response to ProductController.
        Parameters:
        postRequest - A ProductUpsertRequestBody instance containing details of the request.
        Returns:
        A BackendServiceResponseBody instance describing the work done by this layer.
        Throws:
        ResourceAlreadyCreatedException - if the resource is already there.
        BackendServiceException - if SquareService throws a SquareServiceException to us.
        See Also:
        LiteProduct, LiteProductRepository, ProductController.postProduct(ProductUpsertRequestBody), SquareService.postProduct(ProductUpsertRequestBody)

      • getProduct

        public BackendServiceResponseBody getProduct​(ProductGetRequestBody getRequest)
                                      throws BackendServiceException,
                                             ProductNotFoundException
        Sends a GET request for a specific product. Checks against local DB first to avoid a potentially costly SquareService API call.
        Parameters:
        getRequest - The GET request sent to us by ProductController.deleteProduct(String)
        Returns:
        A BackendServiceResponseBody instance describing the work done by this layer.
        Throws:
        BackendServiceException - if an instance of SquareServiceException is caught during the runtime of SquareService.getProduct(ProductGetRequestBody)
        ProductNotFoundException - if the resource is not available.
        See Also:
        ProductController.getProduct(String), SquareService.getProduct(ProductGetRequestBody)

      • getAllProducts

        public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<LiteProduct> getAllProducts​(@NonNull
                                                                        @NonNull java.lang.Integer pageIdx,
                                                                        @NonNull
                                                                        @NonNull java.lang.Integer itemsInPage,
                                                                        @NonNull
                                                                        @NonNull java.lang.String sortByField,
                                                                        @NonNull
                                                                        @NonNull java.lang.String sortOrderString)
        Serve a GET ALL request. Paginates and sorts the output based on provided parameters. For speed, this method does not use SquareService functionality at all ; the entirety of the response comes from our LiteProductRepository and is paginated and sorted using JpaRepository primitives.
        Parameters:
        pageIdx - the current index of the page in the paginated response.
        itemsInPage - the number of items in the current page.
        sortByField - the field of LiteProduct which we will use for sorting the products.
        Returns:
        A BackendServiceResponseBody instance describing the work done by this layer.
        Throws:
        BackendServiceException - if SquareService throws a SquareServiceException.
        See Also:
        ProductController#getAll(Integer, Integer, String), JpaRepository.findAll(), PagingAndSortingRepository.findAll(Pageable)

      • putProduct

        public BackendServiceResponseBody putProduct​(@NonNull
                                             @NonNull ProductUpsertRequestBody putRequest)
                                      throws ProductNotFoundException,
                                             BackendServiceException
        Send a PUT request for a specific product.
        Parameters:
        putRequest - The request body.
        Returns:
        A BackendServiceResponseBody instance describing the work done by this layer.
        Throws:
        ProductNotFoundException
        BackendServiceException
        See Also:
        ProductController.putProduct(ProductUpsertRequestBody, String), SquareService.putProduct(ProductUpsertRequestBody)

      • patchProduct

        public BackendServiceResponseBody patchProduct​(@NonNull
                                               @NonNull ProductUpsertRequestBody request,
                                               @NonNull
                                               @NonNull java.lang.String id)
        Send a PATCH request for a specific product.
        Parameters:
        request - The fields to update.
        id - The unique ID of the field to patch.
        Returns:
        A BackendServiceResponseBody instance describing the work done by this layer.
        See Also:
        ProductController.patchProduct(ProductUpsertRequestBody, String), SquareService.patchProduct(ProductUpsertRequestBody, String)

      • deleteProduct

        public BackendServiceResponseBody deleteProduct​(@NonNull
                                                @NonNull ProductDeleteRequestBody deleteRequest)
                                         throws BackendServiceException,
                                                ProductNotFoundException
        Send a DELETE request for a specific product.
        Parameters:
        deleteRequest - The body of the DELETE request prepared by the client.
        Returns:
        A BackendServiceResponseBody instance describing the work done by this layer.
        Throws:
        BackendServiceException
        ProductNotFoundException
        See Also:
        ProductController.deleteProduct(String), SquareService.deleteProduct(ProductDeleteRequestBody)
